Introduction

Aria is an Indian singer, rapper, and actress under BeBy Entertainment. She is the maknae of the girl group X:in and a former member of the girl group MEP-C formed through the training platform Universe.

Fun facts

1
Aria also appeared at the fourth-ranking on Weibo’s hottest search trends with over 100 million views.
…
2
Aria became the first-ever Indian K-pop idol to perform on local music shows such as Show! Music Core and Inkigayo.
…
3
BTS' "Blood, Sweat & Tears” got her hooked on K-pop.
…
4
Aria dedicated at least two hours of her life every single day to train herself.
…
5
From a young age, Aria has acted in various projects ranging from films, TV shows, documentaries, and more.
…
6
Aria shared that many people do not believe that she is actually Indian.
…
7
She portrayed Ammu in the 2011 film Melvilasom.
…
8
Aria is the first Indian K-pop idol before Shreya Lenkha of BLACKSWAN.
…
